channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16197] Enhance backup delete command
item.description: Currently, backup delete command deletes only physical files/directories in backup destination. It does not update backup system table (incremental backup table set) and it does not delete related backup images (previous ones), thus creating a hole in dependency chain.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Patch v1
v2. Added one more unit test
cc: Ted Yu

+    if(tables.contains(tn)) {

For 'if' and 'for', please insert one space between the keyword and '('.


+  private int deleteBackup(String backupId, BackupSystemTable table) throws IOException {

Name the BackupSystemTable parameter sysTable or something similar - there is tn in the for loop, this would make the code easier to read.


+        // Last backup session for T: YES or NO

+        // ALgorithm:

+        // For every table T from table list 'tables':

Lift the 'For every' comment to first - T should be defined before referenced.


+        return Bytes.equals(toByteArray(), other.toByteArray());

+      } catch (IOException e) {

Is IOE thrown by any methods above ?


+    // TODO: requires FT, failure will leave system

+    // in non-consistent state

Would the above be handled in this JIRA ?


-          LOG.warn("Delete backup failed: no information found for backupID=" + backupId);

+      for (int i = 0; i < backupIds.length; i++) {

Indentation for 'for' loop should be shifted two spaces to the left.


     try (final BackupSystemTable table = new BackupSystemTable(conn)) {

Name table above sysTable.

-1 overall

+   * @param backupId - backup id

+   * @return total number of deleted backup images

+   * @throws IOException

+   */

+  private int deleteBackup(String backupId, BackupSystemTable table) throws IOException {

Add @param for parameter table.


+        // Backup type: FULL or INCREMENTAL

+        // Last backup session for T: YES or NO

+        // ALgorithm:

The above can go into javadoc for method.

Patch is slightly out of sync with HBASE-7912 branch.

Some additional work is required:

  1. FT during delete. Operation MUST be reversible
  2. Need to make sure that no active backup session is running

Updated/ synced patch with the most recent HBASE-7912

They each run over 100 seconds.

Can TestBackupMultipleDeletesEnchanced cover TestBackupMultipleDeletes ?

The goal is to limit duration of new test(s) to around 100 seconds.

Thanks
OK, will do that.
v7 patch.

Here is suggested patch based on v9:

  • used iterator in getBackupHistory(String backupRoot)
  • For getBackupHistoryForTableSet(Set<TableName> set, String backupRoot), removed the loop assigning null for table names in tableHistoryMap

TestBackupMultipleDeletes passes.

See if the code is easier to read.
